/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.promotion.repository.master.PrPlanningDisplayCornerProductDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE PR_PLANNING_DISPLAY_CORNER_PRODUCT
plndp_no = #{plndpNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plndp_corner_seq = #{plndpCornerSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_seq = #{sortSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE plndp_corner_seq = #{plndpCornerSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND plndp_no = #{plndpNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
